      • getSummoners

        public SummonerList getSummoners(long... summonerIds)
        Gets SummonerList through an array of ids. Note that this will only return their names. There is a limit of 40, restricted by the Riot API.
        Parameters:
        summonerIds - Ids of the summoners.
        Returns:
        SummonerList
